game.name: Shoot till you meet Death
game.shortDescription: You can’t outrun Death — but you can make him wait. Shoot till you meet Death is a fast-paced top-down survival shooter. Survive endless waves, forge powerful bullet synergies, and push your limits until you finally meet DEATH himself.
